Draw Lines Apply Inversion
Right Button + dragging : move camera
Wheel : zoom

This shader is based on https://www.shadertoy.com/view/MtKXRh by Jos Leys
Reference: Jos Leys, A fast algorithm for limit sets of Kleinian groups with the Maskit parametrisation.
See also this thread on Fractal Forums. An escape time algorithm for Kleinian group limit sets
Source code on GitHub
